Tom is an independent Java and Kotlin developer from The Netherlands. Over the past 10 years he has worked on commercial and non-commercial projects in sectors including government, banking, mobility and publishing. Aside from coding he enjoys playing bass guitar in a local band and expanding his culinary horizon. You can follow him on Twitter: @tomwetjens.
